nodes.text: Chirrut's lightbow was a lightbow handmade and used by Chirrut Îmwe. It had enough firepower to take down a TIE fighter. Chirrut showcased his continuing faith in the Guardians of the Whills by continuing to use this traditional weapon, while his colleague Baze Malbus used a less-traditional firearm. Îmwe used this weapon during the Mission to Eadu and later used the weapon during the Battle of Scarif.
